snippet: The Rev. Donald J. Harrington’s announcement came a few months after the board of trustees requested an inquiry into possible improprieties at the university.
abstract: Rev Donald J Harrington, longtime president of St John's University, announces his retirement, ending tenure that included successes as well as financial scandal; retirement comes amid pending inquiry into possible financial improprieties involving officials at university, in Queens.
lead_paragraph: The Rev. Donald J. Harrington’s announcement came a few months after the board of trustees requested an inquiry into possible improprieties at the university.

headline.seo: St. John’s President Says He Will Retire
headline.main: Amid Pending Investigation, President of St. John’s Says He Will Retire
headline.print_headline: Amid Pending Investigation, President of St. John’s Says He Will Retire
